property.name: createEventQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.pipeline_event ( operation, stamp, object_type, object_id, data) VALUES ( :OPERATION, :STAMP, :OBJECT_TYPE, :OBJECT_ID, to_jsonb(:DATA::jsonb))

property.name: loadAllEventsByObjectTypeQuery
property.value: SELECT * FROM pipeline.pipeline_event WHERE object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE AND stamp < :STAMP LIMIT :LIMIT;

property.name: deleteEventQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.pipeline_event WHERE object_id = :OBJECT_ID AND stamp < :STAMP AND object_type = :OBJECT_TYPE
